title: 求助，MC一进入就错误退出，怎么办啊？
txt_content:
坐在矿车上旅行到一半的时候忽然错误退出了，再进入就会出现错误代码直接退出，求高手帮忙看看。错误代码如下：

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem.
If you wish to report this, please copy this entire text and email it to support@mojang.com.
Please include a description of what you did when the error occured.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT a1dce528 --------
Generated 11-12-2 下午9:59
Minecraft: Minecraft 1.0.0
OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
Java: 1.6.0_10-rc2, Sun Microsystems Inc.
VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Sun Microsystems Inc.
LWJGL: 2.4.2
OpenGL: Intel Bear Lake B version 1.4.0 - Build 7.14.10.4926, Intel
java.lang.NullPointerException
 at jz.a(SourceFile:167)
 at ry.c(SourceFile:1718)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.k(SourceFile:1593)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.x(SourceFile:705)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:658)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 8bfd48e4 ----------

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
參考這帖, 優化一下, 給 Java 更多內存...
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-6398-1-1.html

well 发表于 2011-12-3 04:31 
參考這帖, 優化一下, 給 Java 更多內存...
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-6398-1-1.html
试过了，还是一样，应该不是内存的原因

green丶bastard 发表于 2011-12-4 06:56 
电脑渣，换电脑。。。
……我原来都可以玩的，跟电脑渣有什么关系？

replies.author: a24520234
replies.txt_content:
可能出錯了==
把地圖保留後再灌MC
